title: Build Personal Web Portfolio
description:
Portfolio web berbasis Next.js dan React yang dirancang sebagai representasi profesional digital untuk menampilkan portofolio, pengalaman profesional, dan personal branding secara konsisten, modern, dan scalable.

### Goals:
- Meningkatkan profesionalitas personal brand
- Mencari opportunity job & career growth (online resume/CV interaktif)
- Fondasi untuk pengembangan konten (blog/news section)

### Target Audience:
- Client (freelance/agency/corporate)
- Recruiter & HR
- Hiring Manager / Tech Lead
- Professional collaborator

### Tech Stack:
- Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript 5
- Tailwind CSS 3, Framer Motion
- React Icons, React Hook Form + Zod

title: Implement performance optimization
description:
Optimize website performance untuk fast loading dan good Core Web Vitals scores.

### Tasks:

**1. Image Optimization:**
- Use Next.js `<Image>` component untuk semua images
- Lazy loading untuk images di bawah fold
- Responsive images dengan srcSet
- WebP format untuk modern browsers
- Proper sizing dan compression

**2. Code Splitting:**
- Dynamic imports untuk pages
- Lazy load components yang tidak critical
- Split vendor bundles
- Tree shaking untuk unused code

**3. Caching Strategy:**
- Static generation untuk pages yang tidak berubah
- ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration) untuk dynamic data
- Browser caching headers
- Service worker (optional)

**4. Performance Metrics:**
- Target Lighthouse scores:
  - Performance: 90+
  - Accessibility: 90+
  - Best Practices: 90+
  - SEO: 90+
- Core Web Vitals:
  - LCP (Largest Contentful Paint): < 2.5s
  - FID (First Input Delay): < 100ms
  - CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift): < 0.1

**5. Optimizations:**
- Minimize CSS/JS bundles
- Remove unused CSS
- Optimize fonts loading
- Prefetch/preload critical resources
notes: Reference spec: Section X - PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION

title: Add SEO and accessibility features
description:
Implement SEO optimization dan accessibility features untuk better search visibility dan user experience.

### SEO Tasks:

**1. Meta Tags:**
- Title tags (unique per page)
- Meta descriptions
- Open Graph tags (for social media)
- Twitter Card tags
- Canonical URLs
- robots.txt
- sitemap.xml

**2. Structured Data:**
- JSON-LD schema markup
- Person schema
- Organization schema
- WebSite schema

**3. SEO Best Practices:**
- Semantic HTML structure
- Proper heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3)
- Descriptive URLs
- Internal linking
- Image alt texts
- Fast loading speed

### Accessibility Tasks:

**1. Semantic HTML:**
- Use proper HTML5 elements: `<header>`, `<nav>`, `<main>`, `<section>`, `<article>`, `<footer>`
- Proper heading hierarchy
- Landmark roles

**2. ARIA Labels:**
- ARIA labels untuk interactive elements
- ARIA roles untuk custom components
- Screen reader announcements

**3. Keyboard Navigation:**
- Clear focus states
- Tab order
- Skip navigation link
- Keyboard shortcuts (optional)

**4. Visual Accessibility:**
- Color contrast: Min WCAG AA standard (4.5:1 untuk text)
- Focus indicators
- Alt text untuk semua images
- Readable font sizes
- No reliance on color alone

**5. Testing:**
- Test dengan screen readers
- Keyboard-only navigation test
- Lighthouse accessibility audit
- WAVE accessibility tool
notes: Reference spec: Section IX - ACCESSIBILITY REQUIREMENTS

title: Profile photo has both rotating ring and morph animation - should only have morph animation
description:
**Current Behavior:**
The profile photo on the Home page displays both:
1. Rotating ring (AnimatedRing component) - 360deg rotation, 3s duration
2. Morph animation - organic blob-like shape morphing

**Expected Behavior:**
The profile photo should ONLY display the morph animation effect without the rotating ring.

**Root Cause:**
ProfileImage component renders both AnimatedRing and morph animation simultaneously (src/components/home/ProfileImage.tsx:20-24).

**Fix Required:**
Remove or disable the AnimatedRing component, keeping only the morph animation effect on the profile photo.

**Files Affected:**
- src/components/home/ProfileImage.tsx

**Visual Reference:**
Screenshot shows both animations active at http://localhost:3000/
close_reason: Fixed by setting showRing default to false in ProfileImage component. Now displays only morph animation without rotating ring.

title: Implement morph animation effect on profile photo in Home page
description:
Implement organic blob-like morphing animation effect on the profile photo in the Home page.

### Animation Specifications:

**1. Morph Animation (CSS Keyframe)**
- Keyframes: 0% → 50% → 100% (border-radius transitions)
- Duration: 8 seconds
- Timing: ease-in-out
- Delay: 1 second
- Iteration: infinite
- Border-radius values create organic shape morphing

**2. Visual Effects**
- Inset box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) 0px 0px 0px 9px inset
- Creates semi-transparent circular border effect (9px, 30% opacity)
- Border follows the morphing shape

**3. Element Structure**
- Container (.avatar): 300px × 300px, position: relative
- Image element (.avatar_img): position: absolute, background-size: cover
- Background-blend-mode: multiply (grayscale effect)
- Overflow: hidden

**4. Implementation Requirements**
- CSS animation with 8 border-radius values for organic shapes
- Smooth transition between morph states
- Inset box-shadow that follows the animated shape
- Proper overflow handling

### Reference:
See docs/photo-profile-animate.md for complete CSS specifications and keyframe values.
close_reason: Successfully implemented morph animation effect on profile photo with organic blob-like shape transitions, inset box-shadow, and multiply blend mode for grayscale effect
